item.title: 观看：荷兰一家法院裁定，荷兰皇家航空公司在所谓的 "洗绿 "案件中，通过旨在改善公司环境形象的广告宣传误导了客户。
item.description:
WATCH: A Dutch court ruled that KLM had misled customers with an advertising campaign aimed at improving the company's environmental image, in a case of so-called 'greenwashing' https://t.co/Ht8NsT7Rjn pic.twitter.com/WiTQcD0A71

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 21, 2024

item.title: 来自@Breakingviews：@AntonyMCurrie 解释说，市场对监管机构指控恒大虚增 780 亿美元销售额视而不见是可以理解的，但已倒闭的美国电力公司安然的传奇故事提醒人们，责任很少只归咎于一家公司。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Markets ignoring a regulator accusing Evergrande of inflating sales by $78 billion is understandable, but the saga of defunct US power firm Enron is a reminder that blame rarely lies with just one company, explains @AntonyMCurrie https://t.co/foulZ2OE9j pic.twitter.com/ISYhG11ZX5

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 21, 2024

item.title: 已倒闭的 SVB 金融集团将向 First Citizens Bancshares 出售印度子公司
item.description:
Defunct SVB Financial Group to sell Indian subsidiary to First Citizens Bancshares https://t.co/d7DPB04VfK pic.twitter.com/BL9eghCItd

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 21, 2024

item.title: 观看：美联储维持借贷成本不变，并强化了今年可能降息多达三次的预期，从而缓解了投资者的紧张情绪，华尔街周三收盘上涨
item.description:
WATCH: Wall Street closed higher on Wednesday after the Federal Reserve eased investor jitters by keeping borrowing costs unchanged and reinforcing expectations that rates could be cut as many as three times this year https://t.co/cyiCExGIHR pic.twitter.com/Jc6EeRu3xh

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 21, 2024

item.title: 拜登政府在密歇根州的政治战场上遭到工业界和汽车工人的反弹后，将美国 2030-32 年电动汽车采用率的目标从 67% 下调至 35%：
item.description:
The Biden administration slashed its target for US electric vehicle adoption by the 2030-32 period from 67% to as little as 35% after industry and autoworker backlash in the political battleground state of Michigan.
More here: https://t.co/JrgpEbrU64 pic.twitter.com/GQMgCkN2uo

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 21, 2024

item.title: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，最近的高通胀读数并未改变美国物价压力缓慢缓解的基本 "情况"，央行仍将按计划在今年进行三次降息：
item.description:
Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said recent high inflation readings had not changed the underlying ‘story’ of slowly easing price pressures in the US as the central bank stayed on track for three interest rate cuts this year.
More here: https://t.co/kFCE7pNUrC pic.twitter.com/mn9GAmQvpR

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 21, 2024

item.title: 报告称，英国金融业面临实现性别均等的漫长道路
item.description:
Britain's finance sector faces long haul to gender parity, report says https://t.co/tOB0jRXaxm pic.twitter.com/sRW6QEgXFy

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 21, 2024

item.title: 英国初创公司 Astroscale 展示了一种解决地球轨道上漂浮垃圾的方法：一种机器人 "抓手"，可以从轨道上抓起旧卫星和其他太空垃圾。
item.description:
UK startup Astroscale has demonstrated what it hopes will be a solution to the trash that's floating around in Earth's orbit: a robotic 'gripper' that can grab old satellites and other space junk from orbit pic.twitter.com/ClyELLfIgh

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称巴克莱准备裁减数百个投资银行职位
item.description:
Barclays poised to cut hundreds of investment bank jobs, sources say https://t.co/tT07t8nBiL pic.twitter.com/9igaVcGhIq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 观看：拜登政府宣布英特尔将获得近 200 亿美元的赠款和贷款，这是美国政府有史以来为促进国内半导体芯片制造而进行的最大一笔投资。
item.description:
WATCH: The Biden administration announced Intel will receive nearly $20 billion in grants and loans in what is the largest US government investment ever to boost domestic semiconductor chip manufacturing https://t.co/KzG1gov0kj pic.twitter.com/Ps6ap1ZdEP

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 观看：法国竞争监管机构对 Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司处以 2.7173 亿美元的罚款，并称其人工智能聊天机器人 "巴德"（后更名为 "双子座"）在未通知出版商和新闻机构的情况下，对其内容进行了训练。
item.description:
WATCH: France's competition watchdog fined Alphabet's Google $271.73 million and said its AI-powered chatbot Bard — since rebranded under the name Gemini — was trained on content from publishers and news agencies, without notifying them https://t.co/NJbhChiiKy pic.twitter.com/b7x8ZGFhly

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：安然事件对其他相关公司造成了影响。@AntonyMCurrie 说：同样，恒大的顾问们现在一定感到很不舒服，投资者如果认为恒大的故事已经结束，那就大错特错了。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: The Enron saga had consequences for other companies involved. Similarly, Evergrande’s advisers must be feeling uncomfortable now and investors would be mistaken in thinking the Evergrande story is all but over, says @AntonyMCurrie https://t.co/foulZ2PbYR pic.twitter.com/VvSA06tNCA

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 备忘录显示加拿大皇家银行战略主管将离职
item.description:
RBC's strategy chief to depart, memo shows https://t.co/Do5VJ1iXr5 pic.twitter.com/lGxVbu1b9z

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 由于核心游戏业务明显放缓，腾讯控股第四季度收入疲软。中国游戏收入下降了 3%，而国际游戏收入仅增长了 1%，如果不考虑汇率波动因素，则下降了 1%。
item.description:
Tencent Holdings posted a weak fourth-quarter revenue as its core gaming business suffered a notable slowdown. Gaming revenue in China declined 3%, while international gaming revenue increased only 1%, or declined by 1% when excluding currency fluctuations https://t.co/ZkTMsEBhMm pic.twitter.com/AahbnBnI9x

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 观看：波音公司第一季度的现金消耗将超过此前预期。该飞机制造商还推迟了公司的现金流目标，因为它限制了其 737 机型的生产
item.description:
WATCH: Boeing will burn through more cash in the first quarter than previously expected. The planemaker also pushed back a company cash-flow goal as it constrains production of its 737 model https://t.co/3LKzYGmX1b pic.twitter.com/zLKXfAebJY

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 贷款人 CIF 批准 8,500 万美元用于北马其顿煤炭淘汰计划

Lender CIF approves $85 mln for North Macedonia coal phase-out plan https://t.co/8wi0mMm1Pm pic.twitter.com/1yCfI4MokG

item.title: 拜登政府发布规定，使汽油车的销售变得更加容易，并放慢了预计在 2030 至 2032 年期间向电动车过渡的速度，这让美国汽车制造商松了一口气：
item.description:
US automakers breathed a sigh of relief after the Biden administration unveiled rules making it easier to sell gas-powered cars and slowing the projected transition to electric vehicles through the 2030-32 period.
More here: https://t.co/JrgpEbsrVC pic.twitter.com/wIrIra5ixP

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 波塔宁推动整合，俄罗斯 Tinkoff 银行将抢占俄罗斯国家银行零售客户
item.description:
Russia's Tinkoff to take Rosbank retail clients as Potanin pushes integration https://t.co/0JYqscibyk pic.twitter.com/E2iovRCxki

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 这个机械臂可能很快就会进入太空，执行抓取地球轨道上漂浮的旧卫星和其他太空碎片的任务。该机器人由初创公司 Astroscale 研发，其愿景是创造一个安全、可持续发展的太空环境。
item.description:
This robotic arm could soon be going into space with a mission to grab old satellites and other space debris floating around the Earth's orbit. The robot has been developed by startup Astroscale with a vision to create a safe and sustainable development of space pic.twitter.com/DXc6st93BT

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 肯尼亚 KCB 集团 2023 年税前利润下降 15
item.description:
Kenya's KCB Group's pretax profit falls 15% in 2023 https://t.co/xqiRUnMSu6 pic.twitter.com/eLFKWnbDYU

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 观看：拜登政府表示，英特尔将获得近 200 亿美元的赠款和贷款，这将大大提高该公司的国内半导体芯片产量，同时也是政府为补贴尖端芯片生产而投入的最大一笔资金。
item.description:
WATCH: The Biden administration said that Intel will receive nearly $20 billion in grants and loans, supercharging the company's domestic semiconductor chip output and marking the government's largest outlay to subsidize leading-edge chip production https://t.co/KzG1gousuL pic.twitter.com/0KqahSCaqn

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，巴克莱准备在投资银行部门裁员数百人
item.description:
Barclays prepares to cut hundreds of jobs in investment bank divison, Bloomberg News reports https://t.co/DxmrlY3adm pic.twitter.com/301WwIorAQ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024
